title: Still Deciding the Best Resident Evil Game
description: Last week we narrowed down the the best Resident Evil games to the final four, and now we're having them duke it out. We've got some truly classic zombie gems going at it this week, and you won't guess what we decide! (Well, you might guess it. In the grand scheme of things there aren't that many options left. But act surprised.)
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
